title: The Banker’s Riddles feat. Jeannie Mai
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Jeannie Mai (Listen Hunnay, The Real) headlines this Chinese and Vietnamese tale about a wise, witty woman who gives a greedy, riddle-loving banker a run for his money.
